handoff_data.summary: Completed comprehensive destination analysis for summer Turkey campaign
handoff_data.context_for_next: Use destination and market insights for creating a short, emotional email focused on summer travel to Turkey. Emphasize all inclusive, beach fun, simple Russian-friendly trip planning, and use the vibrant colors of Kupibilet.
recommendations: Focus on summer advantages and pool or sea imagery
Use CTA color #FF6240 for offers and #4BFF7E for visual freshness
Highlight all inclusive, family programs and last minute deals
Keep text short and emotional with summer mood
Emphasize simple and safe trip planning for Russians
